section.title: Disable Rhnsd
section.para: The rhnsd daemon polls the Red Hat Network web site for scheduled actions. Unless it is necessary to schedule updates remotely through the RHN website, it is recommended that the service be disabled.

listitem.para: CC-13 - Limitation and Control of Network Ports, Protocols, and Services
RHEL-06-000009 - The Red Hat Network Service (rhnsd) service must not be running, unless using RHN or an RHN Satellite.
